name: Guardian Ghostblade
text:
Cost: 0 AP, 1 mana.
Reduce an enemy's attack against one of your allies by 3 damage. This counts as parrying.
Restriction: You must be guarding the attacked ally to perform this action.
Restriction: You must be wielding a dagger or sword to perform this action.

Equipping this ability increases the size of your mana pool by 1.
